chunks.zh: 待在一家公司十二年，快 35 了，该何去何从
chunks.en: Staying in a company for twelve years, almost 35, where should I go?

chunks.zh: 先说下自身情况吧：计算机行业（非互联网） C++程序员，马上 35 周岁，私企（效益拉跨），坐标杭州，已婚一孩，有一房两车，无贷，现金流因为拆迁有个 300w 。
chunks.en: Let me start by describing my situation: I'm a C++ programmer in the computer industry (non-internet), almost 35 years old, working for a private company (with poor performance), located in Hangzhou, married with one child, owning a house and two cars, no debt, and have 3 million in cash flow due to demolition compensation.

chunks.zh: 公司离家五公里内，怎么开车都不堵，十五分钟肯定能到。
chunks.en: The company is within five kilometers of my home, and there's no traffic, so it definitely takes less than fifteen minutes to drive there.

chunks.zh: 自己一年 20 个左右，五险一金基数公司按基数低的交（我也无所谓），媳妇稍微比我少点，但企业福利好，其实算上公积金是要比我好的。
chunks.en: I earn around 200k a year. The company pays the five insurances and one housing fund based on a lower base (which I don't mind). My wife earns a little less than me, but her company benefits are good, so including the housing fund, she actually earns more than me.

chunks.zh: 两人都不卷，对孩子也没卷的想法，所以都无 996 ，照常上下班，公司请假也卡的不严。
chunks.en: Neither of us are into intense work or pushing our child, so we don't work 996, we go to work and leave on time, and the company isn't strict about taking leave.

chunks.zh: 从毕业就进了这家公司，主攻 C++、前端也涉猎，善搬砖。
chunks.en: I joined this company after graduation, mainly focusing on C++, and I also dabble in front-end development. I'm good at being a code monkey.

chunks.zh: 个人不太上进，也许看透了人员进进出出吧，也没多余的晋升想法，就一直做个大头兵，但至少能撑住公司一条业务线。
chunks.en: I'm not very ambitious. Maybe I've seen too many people come and go, so I don't have any desire for promotion. I've always been a foot soldier, but at least I can support one of the company's business lines.

chunks.zh: 疫情这几年，就感受到了公司在走下坡路，基本年终都不发了。
chunks.en: In the past few years of the pandemic, I've felt that the company is declining, and they basically haven't been giving out year-end bonuses.

chunks.zh: 今年更甚，全员降薪，想跑路（找的再差也不能比我现在还差吧，我资薪要求很低了）但看了下惨淡的就业市场，还有通勤，请假的考量，感觉快 35 了，基于我个人情况（无面试经历、表达能力欠缺），找到待遇好的肯定会加班。
chunks.en: This year is even worse, with everyone's salary being cut. I want to leave (it can't be worse than it is now, and my salary requirements are very low), but looking at the dismal job market, as well as considering the commute and taking leave, I feel that I'm almost 35. Based on my personal situation (no interview experience, lack of communication skills), finding a job with good benefits will definitely require overtime.

chunks.zh: 我是继续苟着吗？
chunks.en: Should I continue to endure it?

chunks.zh: 还是要不甘心的放手去找待遇更好的工作，但面临更大的转换成本和压力？
chunks.en: Or should I reluctantly let go and look for a job with better benefits, but face greater transition costs and pressure?

chunks.zh: 各位 V 友给我出出意见，挺迷茫的。
chunks.en: V friends, please give me some advice. I'm very confused.

chunks.zh: 一房两车无贷 300w 现金流，没打过这么富裕的仗
chunks.en: A house, two cars, no debt, and 3 million in cash flow, I've never fought such a rich battle.

chunks.zh: 尼玛，无病呻吟
chunks.en: Damn, just whining about nothing.

chunks.zh: 无病呻吟
chunks.en: Whining about nothing.

chunks.zh: 什么傻逼贴怎么了拆迁款不是 RMB ？
chunks.en: What's with this stupid post? Isn't the demolition compensation in RMB?

chunks.zh: 什么叫除了拆迁款全家“就”40W有房有车无贷款有老婆有孩子父母在还不满意？
chunks.en: What do you mean your whole family 'only' has 400k besides the demolition money, with a house, car, no debt, a wife, kids, and parents, and you're still not satisfied?

chunks.zh: 这边建议亲直接跳楼重生
chunks.en: I suggest you just jump off a building and be reborn.

chunks.zh: 无病呻吟
chunks.en: Whining about nothing.

chunks.zh: 赶紧送外卖，你这情况已经很危险了
chunks.en: Hurry up and become a delivery driver, your situation is already very dangerous.

chunks.zh: 把现金流分我 150W ，然后再买两套房，压力和动力这不就来了？
chunks.en: Give me 1.5 million of your cash flow, and then buy two more houses. Won't that give you pressure and motivation?

chunks.zh: 可能很多人对 300w 没有概念：我算了一下，我们两夫妻都在互联网，从毕业那年低工资算起，2 个人共同奋斗 10 年，除去日常开销，手里也没有 300w 现金，而且我们还是传说中的高薪行业（当然不是顶级程序员收入）2 个人 10 年 = 20 年青春，OP 你已经节省了 20 年的奋斗时间，何必苦恼，人生几个 10 年。
chunks.en: Maybe many people don't have a concept of 3 million: I calculated that both my wife and I are in the internet industry, and starting from the low salary the year we graduated, after 10 years of working together, we don't have 3 million in cash, and we are still in the so-called high-paying industry (of course, not top programmer income). 2 people * 10 years = 20 years of youth, OP you have saved 20 years of hard work, why bother, there are only a few 10 years in a life.

chunks.zh: 是什么霉运让我在这倒霉的上班时间，为了寻找点共鸣，点开了这个炫耀帖
chunks.en: What bad luck made me click on this bragging post during my unlucky work hours, hoping to find some resonance?

chunks.zh: 毕业后就进入一家公司，缺少对社会的基本认知，这个倒是实情。
chunks.en: It's true that you lack a basic understanding of society since you joined one company after graduation.

chunks.zh: 且不说你一直强调狗屎运拆迁 300W 现金流，仅杭州有房无贷这一点，你怎么敢把自己定位在普通人偏下？
chunks.en: Regardless of the fact that you keep emphasizing the lucky demolition compensation of 3 million in cash flow, just the fact that you have a house in Hangzhou with no debt, how dare you position yourself as below average?

chunks.zh: 让其他站友如何自处？
chunks.en: How can other users reconcile this?

chunks.zh: 只能吐槽你炫耀了。
chunks.en: I can only complain that you're showing off.

chunks.zh: 人要不断完善自我认知，你一边强调自己不求上进，一边又厌烦当前安逸的环境，这种认知失调，对于人这种不安分的动物来说太常见了。
chunks.en: People need to constantly improve their self-awareness. You emphasize that you're not ambitious on the one hand, and on the other hand, you're tired of the current comfortable environment. This cognitive dissonance is too common for restless animals like humans.

chunks.zh: 人生旅途有太多这样吃着碗里看着锅里的场景了，35 岁的人应该能理解这更多是一种皮痒了的表现。
chunks.en: There are too many scenarios in life where you're eating from your bowl while looking at the pot. A 35-year-old should understand that this is more of a sign of restlessness.

chunks.zh: 严肃的认识自己，到底希望安逸过一生还是希望更刺激充沛的人生体验。
chunks.en: Seriously understand yourself, do you want to live a comfortable life or a more exciting and fulfilling life experience?

chunks.zh: 35 岁的人应该对眼皮浅、脑子一热的场景有一定的免疫力，应该尝试更长远和更有深度的思考问题。
chunks.en: A 35-year-old should have some immunity to short-sighted and impulsive scenarios, and should try to think about problems in a more long-term and in-depth way.

chunks.zh: 换做是我，我已经在规划退休了，享受生活不好吗，你有什么勾八压力啊，还跟同龄比较有点自卑，你都 35 了还活不明白吗，人生不需要跟任何比，你过得舒服就行了，现在钱也够用了，非得给自己找不痛快
chunks.en: If it were me, I would already be planning my retirement. Isn't it good to enjoy life? What kind of pressure do you have? You're still comparing yourself to your peers and feeling a bit inferior. You're already 35, don't you understand that life doesn't need to be compared to anyone? Just live comfortably. You have enough money now, why do you have to make yourself unhappy?

chunks.zh: 等被裁拿赔偿金
chunks.en: Wait to be laid off and get severance.

chunks.zh: 有 300W 还做这么辛苦的工作干什么？
chunks.en: Why do such hard work when you have 3 million?

chunks.zh: 降低物资欲望吃利息然后每天白天送个 20 单外卖充实自己，又能和陌生人交流又能锻炼身体，下半生不为吃喝生活忧愁，没有压力身体棒棒才能长寿但是看你的想法是打算做一个短命的劳奴，那我劝不了，也给不了什么意见
chunks.en: Reduce your material desires, live off the interest, and then deliver 20 orders of food delivery every day to enrich yourself. You can communicate with strangers and exercise. You won't have to worry about food and life in the second half of your life. Only a healthy body and no stress can lead to longevity. But seeing your idea of wanting to be a short-lived labor slave, I can't persuade you, and I can't give you any advice.

chunks.zh: 无病呻吟
chunks.en: Whining about nothing.

chunks.zh: 此时此刻无比希望 v2 出个点踩功能
chunks.en: At this moment, I really hope that v2 had a downvote feature.

chunks.zh: “创业是人生的修行，是勇敢者的游戏。如果你有梦想，有热情，那就勇敢地去追求，去实践。”——李嘉诚“每个人都有一个属于自己的舞台，而创业就是让你在这个舞台上尽情演绎。”——马化腾“创业就像跳伞，只有勇敢跳出去，才有机会飞得更高更远。”——雷军“创业是一种生活态度，是对自我挑战和成长的追求。”——刘强东“如果你有一个想法，那就去实现它，不要担心失败，因为失败是成功的必经之路。”——理查德·布兰森“创业就是一场冒险，但正是这种冒险精神，让我们有机会创造出伟大的事业。”——马云“如果你有一个梦想，并且相信它能够实现，那就勇敢地去追求，不要让自己的梦想成为遗憾。”——乔布斯
chunks.en: 'Entrepreneurship is a practice in life, a game for the brave. If you have a dream and passion, then bravely pursue it and put it into practice.' - Li Ka-shing 'Everyone has their own stage, and entrepreneurship allows you to perform to your heart's content on this stage.' - Ma Huateng 'Entrepreneurship is like skydiving, only by jumping out bravely can you have the opportunity to fly higher and further.' - Lei Jun 'Entrepreneurship is a way of life, a pursuit of self-challenge and growth.' - Liu Qiangdong 'If you have an idea, then implement it, don't worry about failure, because failure is the necessary path to success.' - Richard Branson 'Entrepreneurship is an adventure, but it is this spirit of adventure that gives us the opportunity to create great undertakings.' - Ma Yun 'If you have a dream and believe it can be realized, then bravely pursue it and don't let your dream become a regret.' - Steve Jobs

chunks.zh: @seanwhy 如果只是薪资不满意，那就继续工作吧。
chunks.en: @seanwhy If you are only dissatisfied with your salary, then continue working.

chunks.zh: 300 万存定期 3%的利率，一年也有 9 万，加上你们夫妻的收入已经很多了。
chunks.en: If you deposit 3 million in a fixed deposit with a 3% interest rate, you will get 90,000 a year, plus you and your wife's income is already a lot.

chunks.zh: 每个公司都有自己的问题，换个公司没准更不满意，钱到是可能会变多
chunks.en: Every company has its own problems, and you may be even more dissatisfied if you change companies, although the money may increase.

chunks.zh: @Rrrrrr 我觉得有病，还病得不轻
chunks.en: @Rrrrrr I think you are sick, and not just mildly.

chunks.zh: 俺不会恶意揣度楼主的发帖目的，我翻完了 2 页评论，仅从楼主的一些话语描述来看，其实楼主挺谦卑的，觉得 300W 不是自己能力获得，不太自信自己的能力~
chunks.en: I won't maliciously speculate on the purpose of the poster's post. I've read through 2 pages of comments, and judging from some of the poster's descriptions, the poster is actually quite humble, and feels that the 3 million wasn't obtained through their own ability, and is not very confident in their own abilities~

chunks.zh: 其实，可以换个角度来想，把它当成你生命的馈赠，要知道绝大多数人都没有这样的机会~
chunks.en: Actually, you can think about it from a different perspective, and treat it as a gift from life. You should know that the vast majority of people don't have such an opportunity~

chunks.zh: 既然收到了这个上天的礼物，就想想怎么打好手里的牌，好好利用，不要让一些消极的想法来加深自己的“自卑”情绪~
chunks.en: Since you have received this gift from God, think about how to play your cards well, make good use of it, and don't let some negative thoughts deepen your feelings of 'inferiority'~

chunks.zh: 人之所以迷茫，就是因为不知道自己要什么~
chunks.en: The reason people are confused is because they don't know what they want~

chunks.zh: 如果觉得当下的工作自己不满意，有各种担忧，而外部环境又很动荡不稳定，凭着自己还算厚实的家底，给自己定一个长期的计划，比如 1-2 年之后自己想干什么，以此来倒推自己应该做什么~
chunks.en: If you feel dissatisfied with your current job and have various worries, and the external environment is volatile and unstable, relying on your fairly solid family background, set a long-term plan for yourself, such as what you want to do in 1-2 years, and use this to deduce what you should do~

chunks.zh: 如果跳槽（短期计划），未来半年即使找到工作了，在新的工作岗位上的新鲜感也很难持续很久，或许只是从一个火坑跳到另一个火坑，更何况想依靠打工致富或财务自由太难了~
chunks.en: If you change jobs (short-term plan), even if you find a job in the next six months, the novelty in the new job will be difficult to sustain for long. Perhaps you are just jumping from one fire pit to another, and it is too difficult to get rich or achieve financial freedom by working~

chunks.zh: 你已经比绝大部分人有了一个好的起点，只要不瞎折腾，你也比绝大部分人有更多的“试错”机会以及重新来过的机会~
chunks.en: You already have a good starting point compared to most people. As long as you don't mess around, you also have more opportunities to 'trial and error' and start over than most people~

chunks.zh: 至于你要怎么做，没有人能给你答案，只能靠你自己去思考，甚至你都可以不做程序员，任何可能都是有的~👍加油楼主😄
chunks.en: As for what you should do, no one can give you the answer. You can only rely on yourself to think about it. You can even not be a programmer. Anything is possible~👍 Cheer up, poster 😄

chunks.zh: OP 说不是来炫耀的，大额存单一天有 300 左右利息，老婆也赚得比自己多，然后真诚（假悻悻）求助 99.99%混得不如自己的 V 友
chunks.en: OP says he didn't come to brag, he gets about 300 in interest per day from large certificates of deposit, and his wife also earns more than him, and then he sincerely (or hypocritically) asks for help from V users who are 99.99% not doing as well as him.
